pwn.name: Conosuba
pwn.desc:
Cono Subarashii Note ni Shukufuku wo! Coroutine Note Subarashii!

Environment: GCP + Google Axion processor

aarch64 PAC + BTI enabled

We will not provide QEMU environment.

rev.name: Baby dot net
rev.desc:
Run: ./Loader.exe

Correct input contains only printable ascii character

rev.name: Baby python
rev.desc: A simple key checker in Python, can you solve it?

rev.name: Witch
rev.desc: It's just a simple Tic-tac-toe game, can you reveal the secret behind it?

web.name: Homework
web.desc:
Have you ever tried doing homework in a CTF?

Note: The outbound access is restricted on the challenge instance.

web.name: Level Up
web.desc: This challenge is revenge of Another secure store note (LINE CTF 2023)

web.name: Restricted Proxy
web.desc:
You are invited to try out the beta version of a new API. Please access it through our Restricted Proxy. Because it is in development stage, it may be underconstructed sometimes.

Note: The outbound access is restricted on the challenge instance.

web.name: Try GoTH
web.desc: I just tried Go, sooooooo good. Sadly migration process isn't.

web.name: Yapper catcher
web.desc: No more manual yapping, LLMs will replace our job if the job is to yap all day. There are problems with them leaking sensitive stuffs nowadays so I've added a fool-proof mechanism to protect your precious data as well!

web.name: Yare yare
web.desc: Our intel discovers some hidden project. Here, grab this spy account and access with this bridge I set up. But remember, what you find is all mine, okay?
